title: A Window on the world of classical ballet
creator_credit: Don Featherstone, Rob McAuley and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Narrated by Richard Morecroft, this entertaining and informative video takes a look at the dailt routine of the Australian Ballet to obtain a better understanding and appreciation of classical ballet. Watch a daily ballet class, take a peek behind the scenes of staging a ballet, meet the dancers and watch a rehearsal and performance of the Act II Pas de deux from Swan Lake. Featured artists include Miranda Coney, Greg Horsman, Steven Heathcote, Campbell McKenzie and Justine Summers and the Australian Ballet School.
